title: Coconut Estate for Sale in Melsiripura.
details:
8.75 Acres of coconut, Pepper, Banana and Mixed cultivated land for sale, situated in Millawana (Close to NLBD Estate). About 6 Km from Melsiripura. Over 600 Coconut trees, Electricity, Water line, side by the spring, fertile soil, carpet road.

Mostly suitable for pepper cultivation.
